div.p:
Time series of ( Upper) the Pacific Decadal Oscillation (PDO) and ( Lower) P
i concentration in the upper water column (0–100 m) at Station ALOHA. The arrows in the Lower panel mark periods following large springtime atmospheric Fe concentration values (mean monthly concentration >40 ng⋅m −3 for particle size fraction <2.5 μm) as recorded at the Mauna Loa Observatory.
